name: erasing radiates warmth
description:
Our memory is unstable – some details are fade away, memories are flow into others and the boundaries of spaces get dissolved. The game reproduces the world of the author's early childhood as she remembers it. It has been recreated from scraps of old photographs and artifacts from the past.

Katerina Egorova is a young russian multimedia artist, works in the field of photography, videography and performative practices. This video game became a part
of an art project dedicated to the exploring of the properties of photography and memory. The project was created at the HSE ART AND DESIGN SCHOOL, curated by Alexandra Kuznetsova.
